dynGuiComponents.text: There are no items in this list.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: For new podcasts, you can search iTunes or fyyd, or browse gpodder.net by name, category or popularity.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: OPML files allow you to move your podcasts from one podcatcher to another.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Friday Night Comedy from BBC Radio 4

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Linux Outlaws - we aim to misbehave

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Two pragmatic geeks talk about the latest news concerning Linux, free and open technology or anything else they deem noteworthy which may include such absurd things as hockey or bands you never heard of. This means there's many a joke and derailed conversation along the way, so don't come here expecting only Linux or software freedom talk — just sit back and relax, partner.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Linux Outlaws 370 – Stay Free, Stay Open Source

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: On the last episode of the show, Dan and Fab answer questions from the listeners, read out their comments, reminisce and talk about what's next including a new show coming in 2015.

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: Linux Outlaws 369 – Dan Lynch’s Hubcap Six

dynGuiComponents.name: android.widget.TextView
dynGuiComponents.text: The final Digital Rights Update with Jim Killock and we discuss Android 5.0, the Sony Pictures Hack as well as the impending threat of J. J. Abrams.
